Package com.gcu.data

Class PostsDataService

java.lang.Object
com.gcu.data.PostsDataService
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataAccessInterface<PostEntity>
@Service public class PostsDataService extends Object implements DataAccessInterface<PostEntity>
A service class for managing post data that implements our data service interface
